title: How would someone video someone’s cell phone without them knowing? - Quora

response.answer_text: This can be done through a malicious application like a trojan. If a user is silly enough to download and install an untrusted application from an unknown source (Usually only available for android phones or Jailbroken Iphones) it is possible to remotely access the device hardware. Long story short… don’t download anything malicious and you will most likely be okay.
